Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
BaseBullet = BasePart:Clone() BaseBullet.Name = "LaserBullet" BaseBullet.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 2, 0.2) BaseBullet.CanCollide = false BaseBullet.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Lime green") Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Head Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Mesh.Parent = BaseBullet Light = Instance.new("PointLight") Light.Brightness = 1 Light.Range = 8 Light.Color = BaseBullet.BrickColor.Color Light.Shadows = false Light.Enabled = true Light.Parent = BaseBullet
Grips = { Equipped = CFrame.new(0.15, -0.3, 0.8, 0.968230426, 0, 0.250059545, 0, 1, -0, -0.250059515, 0, 0.968230546), Unequipped = CFrame.new(0, -0.3, 0.8, 0.99999994, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) }
Animations = { Equip = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Equip"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, Shot = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Shot"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 2, Duration = 1}, SideShot = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("SideShot"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 2, Duration = 1}, Crouch = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Crouch"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, Crawl = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Crawl"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, }
Sounds = { Equip = Handle:WaitForChild("Equip"), LaserShot = Handle:WaitForChild("LaserShot"), LaserHit1 = Handle:WaitForChild("LaserHit1"), LaserHit2 = Handle:WaitForChild("LaserHit2"), }
Gravity = 196.20
Clicks = 0 FirstClick = false
CrawlMode = 0
Damage = 15
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Tool.Grip = Grips.Unequipped Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player then if Mode == "MouseClick" and Value.Down then Activated() elseif Mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = Value.Key local Down = Value.Down if (Key == "x" or Key == "c") and Down and Tool.Enabled then CrawlMode = ((CrawlMode < 2 and (CrawlMode + 1)) or 0) if CrawlMode == 1 then InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.Crouch) InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.Crawl) Tool.Grip = Grips.Equipped if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 InvokeClient("DisableJump", true) end elseif CrawlMode == 2 then InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.Crawl) InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.Crouch) Tool.Grip = Grips.Unequipped if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 8 InvokeClient("DisableJump", true) end else for i, v in pairs({Animations.Crouch, Animations.Crawl}) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end Tool.Grip = Grips.Equipped InvokeClient("DisableJump", false) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end elseif (Key == "q" or Key == "l") and Down then if LightPart and LightPart.Parent then LightPart:Destroy() else LightPart = BasePart:Clone() LightPart.Name = "Light" LightPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really red") LightPart.Transparency = 1 LightPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) LightPart.CanCollide = false local Light = Instance.new("SpotLight") Light.Angle = 70 Light.Brightness = 50 Light.Color = BaseBullet.BrickColor.Color Light.Face = Enum.NormalId.Top Light.Range = 16 Light.Shadows = false Light.Enabled = true Light.Parent = LightPart local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = LightPart Weld.Part1 = Handle Weld.C1 = CFrame.new(0.155, 0.53, -(((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (LightPart.Size.Y / 2)) - 5)) * CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), 0, 0) Weld.Parent = LightPart LightPart.Parent = Handle end end end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function PositionPart(Part, X, Y, Z) local PartClone = Part:Clone() local PartCloneY = PartClone:Clone() PartCloneY.CFrame = PartCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.rad(90), 0, 0) PartCloneY.CFrame = PartCloneY.CFrame - PartCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * Y local PartCloneZ = PartCloneY:Clone() PartCloneZ.CFrame = PartCloneZ.CFrame + PartClone.CFrame.lookVector * Z local PartCloneX = PartCloneZ:Clone() PartCloneX.CFrame = PartCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) PartCloneX.CFrame = PartCloneX.CFrame - PartCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * X return PartCloneX.CFrame end
function FireBullet(SpawnPosition, TargetPosition) local Force = 150 local Bullet = BaseBullet:Clone() local Mass = (Bullet:GetMass() * Gravity) TargetPosition = ((not TargetPosition and (SpawnPosition + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * 2).p) or TargetPosition) local Direction = CFrame.new(SpawnPosition.p, TargetPosition) local Orientation = (Direction + Direction.lookVector * (Bullet.Size.Y / 2)) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) local Velocity = Direction.lookVector * Force local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Velocity BodyVelocity.Parent = Bullet Bullet.Velocity = Velocity local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.cframe = Orientation BodyGyro.Parent = Bullet local HitSounds = {Sounds.LaserHit1, Sounds.LaserHit2} local HitSoundChosen = HitSounds[math.random(1, #HitSounds)]:Clone() HitSoundChosen.Name = "HitSound" HitSoundChosen.Parent = Bullet Debris:AddItem(Bullet, 3) Bullet.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Bullet.CFrame = Orientation return Bullet end
function CheckTableForInstance(Table, Instance) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Instance then return true end end return false end
function Fire(TargetPosition) InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.LaserShot) local Bullets = {} local SpawnPosition = PositionPart(Handle, -0.1, 0.175, ((Handle.Size.Z / 2) - 0.06)) table.insert(Bullets, FireBullet(SpawnPosition, TargetPosition))
local SpawnPosition = PositionPart(Handle, -0.1, 0.385, ((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + 0.04)) table.insert(Bullets, FireBullet(SpawnPosition, TargetPosition)) return Bullets end function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Clicks = (Clicks + 1) if not FirstClick then FirstClick = true local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) wait(0.15) if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end Tool.Enabled = false local Animation = (((Clicks > 1 and CrawlMode == 0) and Animations.SideShot) or Animations.Shot) if CrawlMode == 0 then InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) end local Bullets = {} if Animation == Animations.Shot then
local TargetPosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition", nil) Bullets = Fire(TargetPosition)
else
local Shots = math.random(5, 8) for i = 1, Shots do if CurrentlyEquipped then Bullets = Fire(nil) wait((Animation.Duration / Shots) / 2) end end
end for i, v in pairs(Bullets) do if v and v.Parent and v:IsA("BasePart") then v.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end if Hit.Parent ~= Tool and not CheckTableForInstance(Bullets, Hit) then v:Destroy() end local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Hat") or character:IsA("Tool") and character.Parent then character = character.Parent end local HitSound = v:FindFirstChild("HitSound") if HitSound then HitSound:Play() end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end end) end end wait(Animation.Duration) FirstClick = false Clicks = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.Equip) for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.Animation then InvokeClient("Preload", v.Animation.AnimationId) end end InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.Equip) Tool.Grip = Grips.Equipped end
function Unequipped() CrawlMode = 0 Clicks = 0 FirstClick = false if LightPart and LightPart.Parent then LightPart:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs({ToolUnequipped}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end InvokeClient("DisableJump", false) for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end InvokeClient("StopSound", Sounds.Equip) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end Tool.Grip = Grips.Unequipped end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(Value) end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) return ServerReturn end) end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
